title: Faces Dataset Decompositions
description: This lab applies different unsupervised matrix decomposition (dimension reduction) methods from the module sklearn.decomposition to the Olivetti faces dataset. The Olivetti faces dataset consists of 400 faces of size 64x64 pixels from 40 individuals, each captured with different facial expressions and lighting conditions.

meta.title: Unsupervised Matrix Decomposition on Olivetti Faces Dataset
meta.description: Explore the application of various unsupervised matrix decomposition techniques on the Olivetti faces dataset, including PCA using randomized SVD.
meta.keywords: matrix decomposition, machine learning, pca, dimensionality reduction, unsupervised learning, olivetti faces dataset, scikit-learn, machine learning playground, scikit-learn playground

i18n.title: 人脸数据集分解
i18n.description: 本实验将模块sklearn.decomposition中不同的无监督矩阵分解（降维）方法应用于Olivetti人脸数据集。Olivetti人脸数据集由40个人的400张64x64像素大小的人脸组成，每个人脸在不同的面部表情和光照条件下拍摄。

meta.title: Olivetti人脸数据集上的无监督矩阵分解
meta.description: 探索各种无监督矩阵分解技术在Olivetti人脸数据集上的应用，包括使用随机奇异值分解的主成分分析。
meta.keywords: 矩阵分解, 机器学习, 主成分分析, 降维, 无监督学习, Olivetti人脸数据集,  scikit-learn, 机器学习游乐场, scikit-learn游乐场
